    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.streams \textit{(package)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module hal.streams.pretty\_table}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table}
\begin{alltt}
Pretty prints table in SQL style 
\end{alltt}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table:get_optimal_column_widths}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.streams \textit{(package)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table \textit{(module)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table.get\_optimal\_column\_widths \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_optimal\_column\_widths}(\textit{labels}, \textit{data})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param labels: [] of str
    List of labels of data
:param data: ([] of []) of anything
    Matrix of any type
:return: [] of int
    Length of longest data in each column (labels and data)
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table:get_pretty_row}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.streams \textit{(package)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table \textit{(module)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table.get\_pretty\_row \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_pretty\_row}(\textit{data}, \textit{widths}, \textit{filler}, \textit{splitter})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param data: [] of anything
    List of data
:param widths: [] of int
    Length of longest data in each column
:param filler: char
    Fill empty columns with this char
:param splitter: char
    Separate columns with this char
:return: str
    Pretty formatted row
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table:get_blank_row}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.streams \textit{(package)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table \textit{(module)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table.get\_blank\_row \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_blank\_row}(\textit{widths}, \textit{filler}={\tt \texttt{'}\texttt{-}\texttt{'}}, \textit{splitter}={\tt \texttt{'}\texttt{+}\texttt{'}})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param widths: [] of int
    Length of longest data in each column
:param filler: char
    Fill empty columns with this char
:param splitter: char
    Separate columns with this char
:return: str
    Pretty formatted blank row (with no meaningful data in it)
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table:pretty_format_row}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{pretty\_format\_row}(\textit{data}, \textit{widths}, \textit{filler}={\tt \texttt{'}\texttt{ }\texttt{'}}, \textit{splitter}={\tt \texttt{'}\texttt{{\textbar}}\texttt{'}})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param data: [] of anything
    List of data
:param widths: [] of int
    Length of longest data in each column
:param filler: char
    Fill empty columns with this char
:param splitter: char
    Separate columns with this char
:return: str
    Pretty formatted row
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:streams:pretty_table:pretty_format_table}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.streams \textit{(package)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table \textit{(module)}!hal.streams.pretty\_table.pretty\_format\_table \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{pretty\_format\_table}(\textit{labels}, \textit{data}, \textit{line\_separator}={\tt \texttt{'}\texttt{{\textbackslash}n}\texttt{'}})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param labels: [] of str
    List of labels of data
:param data: ([] of []) of anything
    Matrix of any type
:param line\_separator: str
    Separate each new line with this
:return: str
    Pretty formatted table (first row is labels, then actual data)
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
